title: Ascension
description: What if everything you ever knew about your life was a lie?Jesse is a normal high school senior who has suffered enough loss at his young age already. On the night of his seventeenth birthday he begins having vivid dreams of demons that are set out to get him. At first he believes they are just nightmares, but when things start happening to him he must re-evaluate everything he has ever known. Jesse learns that he is part of a two thousand year old prophecy, set by angels, that will be the final destruction of Lucifer opening the portals to Hell. His Nephilim blood alone will decide the fate of the earth. Throughout the book many secrets are revealed that cause Jesse to lose faith in everything he once knew, including his family and beautiful girlfriend.
author: Jennifer Foor
